properties.areaDesc: Sand Island to Bayfield WI; Port Wing to Sand Island WI
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued January 6 at 3:33PM CST until January 8 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth MN
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater expected, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Small Craft Advisory,
southwest winds 15 to 25 knots this evening veering west
overnight then to northwest late Tuesday. Gusts up to 35 knots
and waves 3 to 5 feet tonight building to 4 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Port Wing to Sand Island WI and Sand Island to
Bayfield WI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 10 AM
Tuesday to 6 AM CST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory,
until 4 AM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners, especially those operating smaller vessels, should
avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY
